WorkItem.Description:
I tried to run rawr4 for the first time today, from http://elitistjerks.com/rawr.php.
 
I am on vista32 with firefox.
 
Rawr refused to start up.
 
Right after the "increase memory to 32 meg" dialog, it failed with this error popup:
 
(I couldn't copy/paste the dialog, so I may have mis-transcribed something...):
 
Function:ItemCache.Load(...)
 
Error Message: This is an error in XML document (61149, 12)
 
Inner Error Message: Instance Validation error: "Holy Shield" is not a valid
value for Trigger.
 
Info: No additional Info
 
Stack Trace:
  at System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialze(XMLReader xmlRead, String encodingStyle, Object events)
  at System.XmlSerialization.XMLSerializer.Deserialzize(TextReader textReader)
 at Rawr.ItemCacheInstance.Load(textReader reader)

Comments.Message: Clear the Silverlight cache, you are using outdated data
and try Tools > Reset All Caches.

Problem was solved by upgrading silverlight.

Jothay, I think you mean options -> Reset all caches.  Alas, the app didn't make it that var, so the menus were not available until silverlight was updated.
